job_details.Vacaturetitel: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building user-facing applications powered by generative AI, including prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and integrating AI into full-stack products. The focus on end-to-end product lifecycle and creating novel educational experiences with LLMs aligns strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile.

evidence.phrase: redefine the frontier of K-12 learning
evidence.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the educational domain and the business goal of transforming it.

evidence.phrase: Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling.
evidence.justification: Demonstrates an understanding of the core business offering and its scientific underpinnings.

evidence.phrase: High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.
evidence.justification: Highlights the measurable business outcomes and impact of the product.

evidence.phrase: architecting this AI-powered learning revolution
evidence.justification: Implies understanding the strategic vision and technical roadmap for the business.

evidence.phrase: ensure we're nailing learner needs
evidence.justification: Focuses on understanding and meeting the needs of the end-users (students).

evidence.phrase: align development with learner needs
evidence.justification: Connects technical development directly to business and user requirements.

evidence.phrase: fuel cycles of innovation
evidence.justification: Indicates a focus on continuous improvement and business growth through new ideas.

evidence.justification: Emphasizes the scale and business objective of the AI applications.

evidence.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
evidence.justification: This encapsulates the core business goal of improving educational outcomes through AI.
